name: 3D Fun Girly Car Racing
description:
-------CUTEST GIRL GAME OUT THERE!!!!--------

This awesome Girly Convertible Race Game will have you riding in real fashion and style!!!

Awesome New Game Play!!!!
-Choose from 4 Totally Hot Cars!!
-Collect Coins and Power-ups!!
-Crush Your Opponents (with class, of course!!!)
-Look Good AND Dominate the Roads!!

------------------------------------------------
"I love the pink car!!!" -Ella A.
"I am seriously addicted to this game!!!" -Kate T.
------------------------------------------------

It's your time to shine in this ultimate Girl Racing Game!

Download TODAY and get ready to roll!!!
